channel.title: Comments on: Only in My Guild

item.title: By: Balerion
item.dc:creator: Balerion
item.description: "He rolled NEED on my purpz so I shot him"
item.content:encoded: “He rolled NEED on my purpz so I shot him”

item.title: By: thecheesypoofs
item.dc:creator: thecheesypoofs
item.description:
I .. I mean ... I ...
I'll take "speechless" for 200$ Alex please.
PS : I really enjoy your BLOG and the little adventures you share with us but for the love of everything that is holy, please never never never transfer or re-roll on my server. I would be too affraid that some (or even just one for that matter) of your guildies or ex-guildies would follow you.
Nothing personal, hope you understand : )
item.content:encoded:
I .. I mean … I …

I’ll take “speechless” for 200$ Alex please.

PS : I really enjoy your BLOG and the little adventures you share with us but for the love of everything that is holy, please never never never transfer or re-roll on my server. I would be too affraid that some (or even just one for that matter) of your guildies or ex-guildies would follow you.

Nothing personal, hope you understand : )

item.title: By: Sayge
item.dc:creator: Sayge
item.description: hahaha that really funny, he seems so nonchalant about shooting someone.
item.content:encoded: hahaha that really funny, he seems so nonchalant about shooting someone.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.content:encoded:
Wow! so many boggling details, that I’m sure I’m much happier not knowing.

Hence why I would have been right there with Foton going,

please don’t ask .. please don’t ask .. please don’t ask.

item.title: By: Lassirra
item.dc:creator: Lassirra
item.description:
"so I shot him"
I love that it was said as casually as "I spilled milk on the counter, so I wiped it up with a sponge".
Like it was the only logical response.
And what I'd really like to know (or actually, maybe I don't...) is how a shooting is considered a "hate crime". I would call it attempted murder, personally. And why wasn't the other gentleman charged with assault? Wow.... so many boggling details, that I'm sure I'm much happier not knowing.
item.content:encoded:
“so I shot him”

I love that it was said as casually as “I spilled milk on the counter, so I wiped it up with a sponge”.

Like it was the only logical response.

And what I’d really like to know (or actually, maybe I don’t…) is how a shooting is considered a “hate crime”. I would call it attempted murder, personally. And why wasn’t the other gentleman charged with assault? Wow…. so many boggling details, that I’m sure I’m much happier not knowing.

item.title: By: Ramada
item.dc:creator: Ramada
item.description:
Looks like he should have gone to the library. His mastery of the English language is lacking.
Course, judging by the story, his mastery of not doing stupid shit is lacking as well.
item.content:encoded:
Looks like he should have gone to the library. His mastery of the English language is lacking.

Course, judging by the story, his mastery of not doing stupid shit is lacking as well.

item.title: By: DM Osbon
item.dc:creator: DM Osbon
item.description: Must be a proud moment for the guy, so much so he has to share it with complete strangers. Maybe this means anyone who knows him would probably shoot him if they could.
item.content:encoded: Must be a proud moment for the guy, so much so he has to share it with complete strangers. Maybe this means anyone who knows him would probably shoot him if they could.
